Welcome to the Gables Chat Theatre!
This theatre is an experiment using the Skotos chat theatre system. The purpose behind this experiment is to have a general chat theatre where participants can socialize and/or roleplay, on their own accord or by participating in scheduled events.
By default, you are using chatmode. To enable/disable it, type /chatmode. For more help on this, see the help topic.
